secondScreens.title: Device retrieval & redeployment services
secondScreens.stepOneDescription: Collect devices from branch offices, remote teams, and warehouse stock.
secondScreens.stepTwoDescription: Scan, sanitize, and transport every asset with documented chain of custody.
secondScreens.stepThreeDescription: Refurbish and redeploy hardware with current images and paperwork.
secondScreens.stepFourDescription: Reconcile redeployments with finance and inventory controls.

secondScreens.title: IT asset disposition (ITAD) for end-user devices
secondScreens.stepOneDescription: Grade equipment, capture condition photos, and sort reusable components.
secondScreens.stepTwoDescription: Perform certified data sanitization tailored to compliance requirements.
secondScreens.stepThreeDescription: Remarket or recycle assets to maximize value recovery and sustainability.
secondScreens.stepFourDescription: Report resale value, recycling volumes, and carbon savings.

secondScreens.title: Decommissioning and logistics
secondScreens.stepOneDescription: Plan crate-and-move timelines, label racks, and schedule secure transport.
secondScreens.stepTwoDescription: Provide detailed chain-of-custody records, insurance, and compliance reporting.
secondScreens.stepThreeDescription: Deliver assets to lifecycle facilities for reuse, redeployment, or disposal.
secondScreens.stepFourDescription: Produce executive-ready closeout reports with photos and KPIs.

secondScreens.title: Smart Vault archiving
secondScreens.stepOneDescription: Digitize and enrich legacy records with searchable metadata.
secondScreens.stepTwoDescription: Store media in climate-controlled vaults and Smart Vault repositories.
secondScreens.stepThreeDescription: Provide global access, retention controls, and AI-powered search.
secondScreens.stepFourDescription: Deliver analytics on usage, retention, and compliance readiness.
